articles.title: 33 Dead As Heavy Rain Causes Flash Floods, Landslides In Several States
articles.description: 33 deaths were reported on Saturday as heavy rain pounded several states, including Himachal Pradesh, Jharkhand, Odisha and Uttarakhand, triggering flash floods and landslides.
